trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Card Name
H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Dinosaurs, Vehicles, and other Transformers® creatures you control get +2/+0. {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: Grimlock, Dinobot Leader becomes Grimlock, Ferocious King.
trans-unit.target: Dinosaurs, Vehicles, and other Transformers® creatures you control get +2/+0. {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: Grimlock, Dinobot Leader becomes Grimlock, Ferocious King.

trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Flavor Text
H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Card Name
H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: Grimlock, Ferocious King becomes Grimlock, Dinobot Leader.
trans-unit.target: Trample {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: Grimlock, Ferocious King becomes Grimlock, Dinobot Leader.

trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why you think Grimlock stupid? Me not stupid. Grimlock smartest Dinobot."
trans-unit.target: "Why you think Grimlock stupid? Me not stupid. Grimlock smartest Dinobot."

trans-unit.source: Fire a Nerf® blaster until empty at target library from at least two meters away. For each card knocked off that library, put it into its owner's graveyard and Nerf War deals ½ damage to that player. (Foam darts only.)
trans-unit.target: Fire a Nerf® blaster until empty at target library from at least two meters away. For each card knocked off that library, put it into its owner's graveyard and Nerf War deals ½ damage to that player. (Foam darts only.)

trans-unit.source: "I'll tell you one thing—it's not nothin'!"\n—Garj Grabclaw, goblin sergeant
trans-unit.target: "I'll tell you one thing—it's not nothin'!"\n—Garj Grabclaw, goblin sergeant
